ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Game loading faster
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually play EQ on 2 (sometimes 3) different machines (and soon 4).  But my main system, the game loads in like 3 minutes, and that s with zone caching on.
ygData.messageBody:
I actually play EQ on 2 (sometimes 3) different machines (and soon 4).  But my main system, the game loads in like 3 minutes, and that's with zone caching on.
 
Asus P4C533-E motherboard
Pentium 4 2.4Ghz
1GB 333mhz DDR
ATI All In Wonder 2006  Ed. 256MB 4X AGP
120GB HDD
Creative Audigy 2 6.1 Surround Sound
 
and probably this year sometime I'll be upgrading that to a 3.0Ghz CPU or better with a PCI-E video card.
 
not that I need to, but turning clip plane down gives me no lag in POK.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Scendera
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, January 05, 2006 1:18 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Game loading faster

I'm running Win2k Pro on:

AthlonXP 3000+
512 mb PC2100 ram
Geforce FX5200 (128 mb)
80 gb ATA133 hd
Custom pagefile - min is 1.5 gb, max is 3 gb

I've got all models except Erudites and Ogres on, music and spell effects
off as a matter of preference...everything else except gamma is set to the
max.

No lag. Runs like a dream.

My connection is 1.5 down/384 up DSL through Alltel, using the provided
modem and shared using another machine as router and firewall.

Someone mentioned defragging....PerfectDisk seems to be quite nice and it
can do it while the machine is idle automatically. I highly recommend it.

I used to run WinME on the machine and it ran like a bat out of hell, even
faster than 2k, but I was eventually forced to drop it during some
troubleshooting. Problem turned out to be bad ram but no one would actually
listen to me when I insisted ME was innocent here, and had ran quite nicely
before the ram started acting up. It took installing another OS before
anyone else thought there was *really* a problem.

Not one word about WinME. I know what's generally thought of it. :-)

----- Original Message -----
From: "Steven R. Hulse" <steven.hulse@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, December 31, 2005 2:40 PM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Game loading faster


> Dang Su, what's the stats on your PC? I think mine takes about 5 minutes
to
> load.
>
> Here's what I have...
>
> eMachines W3050 Wal*Mart special (Hey, it was cheap and I needed something
> bad)
>
> 2Ghz AMD processor
> 2GB Ram (upgraded from 512)
> 80GB HD
> 10GB HD (Added)
>
> I have the OS (WinXP Pro, it came with Home) loaded on the 10GB drive and
> the 80 GB drive partitioned off with a 5GB partition dedicated as a swap
or
> paging file.
>
> Granted this probably helps me load faster but can be a real headache to
> configure for the average computer user who doesn't want to mess with all
> that. Also when was the last time you defragged? That could help some.
>
> Durgaa
>
